Reviews.Title: “great location, bed bug central.”

Reviews.Title: “Average Place, Great Location”

Reviews.Content: friends stayed 4 nights aged 1922 stairs nice climb youre top floor especially youve heavy baggage overall deal compared people giving reviews fine nice view clean bad size brilliant location comfy beds people complaining guess im fussy real stairs shower basically shower cupboard glass pane door person towel fine

Reviews.Content: booked triple trip sister friend tight toilet mouldy ceiling doors mice coming croissant middle night dont remember mice included booking kept food subsequent nights gone staff empty bottle table intentions knowledge towels provided near standards hotel welllocated prime district morning traffic annoying person steep stairs arriving surprise brace yourself owner refurbishing hotel convert hostel overall bad accommodation expectations

Reviews.Content: trip amsterdam spend weekend friends booked 3 nights due location city center immediately arrival hotel pay bill unusual terminal reception didnt accepted valid credit cards pay cash third floor steep stairs looked seventh arrived hours checkin wait hour cleaned apparently able change bedclothes 15 minutes smiling babbling able shock entered dark dirty closet tiny shower light 100 opposite shiny photos hotel web page instead 3 beds complains unsuccessful spent night hunt cockroach sleeping hard thin walls didnt filter word decided leave hotel night stayed till low budget hotel bury hopes accommodation
